verbose_text: This inhibitory effect of TLR3 signaling is also supported by a previous report that activation of TLR3 by injection of its ligand, polyinosinic-polycytidylic acid (poly (I : C)), suppressed liver regeneration after PH [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: activation of TLR3 by injection of its ligand, polyinosinic-polycytidylic acid
